body:
Reverts spack/spack#26784

Spack may silently fail to apply patches, even though the patch is in the spec/hash etc. Since there was no progress in fixing the issue, I think it's better to revert (which I do anyways on my local version of Spack, but sometimes forget elsewhere). It's really bad if I can't be sure a patch applies when adding a new version to package, Spack will just tell me it does...
title: Revert "patches: make re-applied patches idempotent"
